img_text: Meet Hawaii's Democrat Senator Mazie Hirono Democrat Senator Mazie Hirono Says Brett Kavanaugh Is Not Entitled To A Presumption Of Innocence Because He's A Republican. Senior Democrat Senator Hirono Says Republicans Are Guilty Before Innocent. Senator Hirono Says White, Christian, Republicans Are Not Entitled To A Presumption Of Innocence Because Of Who They Are And How They Think. Americans Should Not Accepft Such Hate!
